channel.title: How to make anchent mage work and use no runes
channel.description:
how to make anchent mage work and use no runes can some one help me
also how do i make monsters that ive create drop more then 1 thing for example ive created jad and put on drops.cfg so it would drop firecape zammy cape and zammy staff but all he drops is fire cape
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 11:56:10 PM[/size][hr]any one there who can help?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 12:02:31 AM[/size][hr]omg some one plz help me cmon
